summary:
A Tent near west entrance of Riverwood.
You can use Nor Tent or Imperial Tent.
Craftings, saddled horse and a dog.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ff00][size=5][b]Player's Camp[/b][/size][/color]

[size=3]A Tent near west entrance of Riverwood.
You can use Nor Tent or Imperial Tent. Choose only one.

[color=#ffff00]You can now crafting with new Nor Tent V1.1.
[/color][color=#ffff00]I've added Alchemy and Enchanting tables inside.
Cooking infront of the nor tent.
[/color][color=#ffff00]You can fast travel to your camp after discovered.
[/color][color=#ffff00]And you have a saddled horse named Breeze but he is as hurricane. :)
[/color][color=#ffff00]He is 30% faster than the other horses and you can ride longer period with him.
[/color][color=#ffff00]If you lost Breeze, he comes back to the camp. You can find him at the camp again.

[/color][b][color=#f1c232]In the tent you find[/color][/b];
One Bed Roll for you and one for your follower.
Player Chest, Strong Box, Satchel and a Knapsack.

You can get Well Rested bonus if you sleep at the camp.

You will see a dog front of the tent.
His name is Bia.He is essential but not a follower.
He protect your camp when you aren't thereÂ or when you are sleeping at night.[/size]

[size=4][url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/21386819?tab=user+files]MY MODS[/url][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/21386819/?tb=mods&pUp=1]
[/url][size=3]
[/size]
author: cengo
